title: How to Write Poetry: A Tutorial: Book 2: Intermediate
description: Following Book 1: Beginning, How to Write Poetry: A Tutorial, Book 2: Intermediate raises the bar, teaching more poetic devices, expanding oneâ€™s poetry vocabulary, introducing additional terminology, and challenging the writer to think on an increasingly sensitive and abstract level. Many new forms are presented, giving the poet a broad view of poetry from around the world and over the centuries.
author: Marcus  Holmes
